Configuration¶

Module of weko-sitemap.

weko_sitemap.config.SITEMAP_BLUEPRINT = None¶

Set our own Blueprint

weko_sitemap.config.WEKO_SITEMAP_ADMIN_TEMPLATE = 'weko_sitemap/sitemap.html'¶

Sitemap templates.

weko_sitemap.config.WEKO_SITEMAP_BASE_TEMPLATE = 'weko_sitemap/base.html'¶

Default base template for the demo page.

weko_sitemap.config.WEKO_SITEMAP_TOTAL_MAX_URL_COUNT = 10000000¶

Max urls for all pages in total.

weko-sitemap

Module of weko-sitemap.
